column1: 16158,Immortal Iron Fist (2006) #9,9,34271,64,"Daniel Rand is the Immortal Weapon of the mystical city of K'un-Lun...the legendary kung fu hero Iron Fist.  Danny has found himself forced to take part in a reality-spanning kung fu championship that matches the seven -- Really! Seven! -- Immortal Weapons like himself against one another. The prize is glory, but for Danny, the penalty of losing will be deathâ€""this contest is rigged, and there's no hope of escaping alive. Who has the best kung fu?",
